headline: Globe Life Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Globe Life (NYSE:GL) reported higher fourth-quarter earnings and outlined expectations for premium growth, underwriting margins, and capital deployment in its latest earnings call, citing favorable mortality trends, continued momentum in Medicare Supplement sales, and ongoing technology investments
